title: "Your Shop is disabled"
body: Hey, So earlier today a refunded a champ purchased by IP and then purchased another one with IP (probably about an hour  and a half ago ~9 am eastern time) I just bought the 35$ package for RP and now the shop is disabled and the RP I purchased isn't showing. I logged in and logged out, made sure my email was verified and nothing has changed. It is on my alt account. The summoner name is kootiesthekooter. Thanks for any help.

replies.body: The "Shop is disabled" notification is about the personalised shop that appeared yesterday giving discounts. The normal shop should remain open.
It sounds like it may have been a syncing or processing issue, but I'm glad to hear everything is okay now!
... I guess it just resolved itself so nevermind?
